document_data.name: Mus
document_data.mainbody: '''Mus''' was an [[ogre mage]] living on [[Jazirat al-Sadaf]] in the [[Crowded Sea]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}} He was the head of a family of ogre mages.
document_data.Activities: The [[oni]] planned to unleash a horde of [[sartani]] on the other islanders of [[Jazayir al-Sartan]]. He was able to summon the sartani by using special magical shells gifted to him by [[Kar'r'rga]].
document_data.Possessions: Mus had a collection of magical shells that could be used to summon and control sartani once dropped into sea water.
